title: Symbolism of the Christmas Tree
description:
The symbolism of the Christmas tree can help us not only to understand the tree itself, but also understand how symbolism works.  

My links:  

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

The podcast: https://soundcloud.com/jonathan-pagea...
website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
